metalign.voice

Class VoiceSplittingModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.generic.MidiModelState
      • metalign.voice.VoiceSplittingModelState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MidiModelState>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FromFileVoiceSplittingModelState, HmmVoiceSplittingModelState

    public abstract class VoiceSplittingModelState
extends MidiModelState
    A VoiceSplittingModelState is a MidiModelState which contains a List of Voices into which the incoming MIDI data has been split. In order to get these voices, the getVoices() method should be called.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 4 Sept, 2015
